milestones.title: Phase 1: Requirements Gathering & Core Setup
milestones.description: Gather detailed requirements, finalize tech stack, set up project infrastructure (repository, CI/CD pipeline, cloud environment), and design database schema. | Deliverables: Detailed requirements document, Technology stack selection, Infrastructure setup (AWS/Azure/GCP), Database schema design, Project repository setup with CI/CD

milestones.title: Phase 2: User Authentication & Product Catalog
milestones.description: Develop user registration, authentication (login/logout), and basic product catalog functionality including adding, editing, and deleting products. Implement basic search functionality. | Deliverables: User registration and authentication module, Basic product catalog API (CRUD operations), Basic product search functionality, Database integration for user and product data

milestones.title: Phase 3: Shopping Cart & Checkout
milestones.description: Implement shopping cart functionality, checkout process, and integrate with Stripe/PayPal for payment processing. Implement basic order management. | Deliverables: Shopping cart functionality, Checkout process with address and shipping options, Stripe/PayPal integration for payment processing, Basic order management system (create/view orders)

milestones.title: Phase 4: Admin Panel & Advanced Features
milestones.description: Develop the admin panel for inventory management, customer review and rating system, and email notification service. Implement advanced search filters. | Deliverables: Admin panel for inventory management, Customer reviews and ratings system, Email notification service (order confirmation, etc.), Advanced product search filters

milestones.title: Phase 5: Beta Testing & Performance Optimization
milestones.description: Conduct beta testing with a small group of users, fix bugs, and optimize performance for handling 1,000 concurrent users. Focus on mobile responsiveness. | Deliverables: Beta release of the platform, Bug fixes based on beta testing feedback, Performance optimization report, Mobile-responsive design implementation

milestones.title: Phase 6: Final Testing & Deployment
milestones.description: Conduct final testing, address any remaining issues, and deploy the platform to production. Monitor performance and stability. | Deliverables: Final release of the platform, Deployment to production environment, Monitoring and stability reports, Documentation for users and administrators

tasks.title: Requirements Gathering
tasks.description: Collect and document project requirements from stakeholders

tasks.title: Market Research
tasks.description: Research market trends, competitors, and user needs

tasks.title: System Architecture Design
tasks.description: Design overall system architecture and component interactions

tasks.title: Database Design
tasks.description: Design database schema and data models

tasks.title: UI/UX Design
tasks.description: Create user interface mockups and user experience flows

tasks.title: Backend API Development
tasks.description: Develop core backend APIs and business logic

tasks.title: Frontend Development
tasks.description: Implement user interface and frontend functionality

tasks.title: Database Implementation
tasks.description: Set up database and implement data access layer

tasks.title: Unit Testing
tasks.description: Write and execute unit tests for all components

tasks.title: Integration Testing
tasks.description: Test integration between different system components

tasks.title: User Acceptance Testing
tasks.description: Conduct UAT with stakeholders and end users

tasks.title: Production Environment Setup
tasks.description: Set up production infrastructure and deployment pipeline

tasks.title: Deployment & Go-Live
tasks.description: Deploy application to production and monitor launch

tasks.title: Post-Launch Support
tasks.description: Monitor system performance and provide immediate support
